title: A Question of Balance
brief_description: This program looks at the issue of woodchipping and forestry management in Australia, with special emphasis on the South East Forest region of Victoria and NSW, and asks the question…What’s it worth to disrupt the balance? With the advent of the Greenhouse Effect it is now imperative that we look carefully and critically at how we manage our environment.
